text:
Simone Albrigi (born 8 October 1988, Verona, Italy) better known as "Sio" is an Italian cartoonist and youtuber.
Biography.
He was educated at Ca' Foscari University of Venice.
In 2006 he joined the group Shockdom and he pubblished his first Comic "L'uomo scottecs". The English version of the comic was released in 2012.
Sio became a father in 2019, and on 30th May, he published his first videogame "Super Cane Magic ZERO - Legend of the Cane Cane".
